topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: JavaTimeShift 4 SMTP
short_description: A little Java-Server-Software (like a SMTP-proxy), which accepts incoming SMTP-Messages. The subject will be parsed for @ or + symbols, which should control time shifted sending. If not contained, the message will be forwarded to parent smtp.
